definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Ex 14:27 sea (Ph. [[ים]]; Ar. yam=un; Palm. [[בימא]] on the sea, Vog:No. 79; on As. iâmu, (āmu), sea, v. Dl:HWB 307 M-A:CD 52 Hpt:BAS i. 171 n.)—abs. [[יׇם]] 1Sa 13:5 +; [[יׇ֫מָּה]] Ge 28:14 +; cstr. [[יָם]] Ge 14:3 + 23 t., also [[יׇ֫מָּה סוּף]] Ex 10:19, but alw. [[יַם־סוּף]] Ex 13:18 + 22 t.; sf. [[יַמָּהּ]] Je 51:36; pl. [[יַמִּים]] Ju Jdg 5:17 + 29 t.;—sea: esp.

Mediterranean Nu 13:29 (E), Nu 34:5 (P), De 1:7 Jos 5:1, 1Ki 5:23, 1Ki 5:23, Jon 1:4, Jon 1:4 + oft.; the Mediterr. is called also [[הַיׇּם הַגׇּדוֹל]] Nu 34:6, Nu 34:7, Jos 15:12, Jos 15:47, Ez Eze 48:28 +, cf. [[וּרְחַב יׇדַיִם]] ´[[גּ]] ´[[הַיּ]] Ps 104:25; [[מְבוֹא]] ´[[הַיָּם חַגּ]] [[הַשָָּׁמֶשׁ]] Jos 1:4, Jos 23:4 (v. As. name of Mediterr. tiamtu rabitu ša sulmu šamši, etc., Schr:Namender Meere. 171 ff.); [[אֶל־מוּל הַלְּבָנוֹן]] ´[[הַגּ]] ´[[הַיּ]] Jos 9:1; [[הָאַחֲרוֹן]] ´[[הַיּ]] the hinder sea De 11:24, De 34:2, Zec 14:8, Joe 2:20 (in the last two opp. [[הַקַּדְמׂנִי]] ´[[הַיּ]], v. infr.); of Mediterr. in particular part [[יׇם פְּלִשְׁתִּים]] Ex 23:31 (JE); [[יׇם יׇפוֹ]] 2Ch 2:15 = [[יׇם יׇפוֹא]] Ezr 3:7.

[[יַם־סוּף]] &;ls;Red Sea’ (v. [[סוּף]]) Ex 13:18 (cf. Ex 10:19), Ex 15:4, Nu 14:25, De 1:40, Jos 2:10, Ju Jdg 11:16 + oft.; also [[הַיׇּם]] Ex 14:2, Ex 14:2, Ex 14:9, Is 51:10, Is 51:10, Is 63:11 +; prob. also [[יׇם־מִחְרַיִם]] Is 11:15; ‘ Red Sea ’ named or referred to c. 66 t.; [[יִם־סוּף]] clearly of Ælanitic Gulf 1Ki 9:26 (cf. 2Ch 8:17).

Dead Sea, [[יׇם]] [[מֶלַח]] sea of salt Ge 14:3, Nu 34:3, Nu 34:12, De 3:17, Jos 3:16, Jos 12:3, Jos 15:2, Jos 15:5, Jos 18:19; [[יׇם הָעֲרָבָה]] De 3:17, De 4:49, Jos 3:16, Jos 12:3, 2Ki 14:25; [[הַקַּדְמׂנִי]] ´[[הַי]] Ez Eze 47:18, Zec 14:8, Joe 2:29 (v. supr.); simply [[יׇם]] Is 16:8, Je 48:32; —in [[יׇם יַעְזֵר]] Je 48:32 [[יׇם]] is text. error, del. c. Gf Gr Che Gie.
Sea of Galilee [[יׇם כִּנֶּרֶת]] Nu 34:11, Jos 13:27; [[יׇם כִּנְּרוֹת]] Jos 12:3; simply [[יׇם]] De 33:23.

more gen. sea, opp. earth and (or) sky Ge 1:26, Ge 1:28, Ge 9:2 (P), Ex 20:11 (E), Hag 2:6 + oft. Jb Psalm Is:Is 2 etc.; Am 6:12 rd. [[בַּבָּקָר יׇם]] for [[בקרים]] (v. [[בָּקָר]]); sea as under earth Ps 24:2 (cf. Ge 1:10, Ge 6:11, Ex 20:5 = De 5:3); fig. of flood of invaders, [[עָלָה עַל־בָּבֶל הַיׇּם]] Je 51:42.

of a mighty river, the Nile Na 3:8, Na 3:8, Is 19:5 (‖[[נׇהָר]]); cf. [[הַתַּנִּין אֲשֶׁר בַּיׇּם]] Is 27:1 and [[כַּתַּנִּים בַּיַּמִּים]] Ez Eze 32:2 (sim. of Pharaoh); of Euphrates Is 21:1, Je 51:36 (acc. to Che Gf al.; Is 21:1 perhaps better of Persian Gulf, v. Di).

the great basin in temple-court, called the sea: [[וַיַּעַשׂ אֶת־הַיׇּם מוּחָק]] 1Ki 7:23 = 2Ch 4:2; [[יׇם הַנְּחשֶׁת]] 2Ki 25:13, 1Ch 18:8, Je 52:17; [[הַיׇּם]] alone 1Ki 7:24, 1Ki 7:25 + 10 t. K Ch + Je 52:20.

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: shore of sea, sea-shore [[שְׂפַת הַיׇּם]] Jos 11:4, 1Ki 5:9, and in sim. Ge 22:17, Ju Jdg 7:12, 1Sa 13:5; ´[[חוֹף הַי]] Jos 9:1, Ez Eze 25:16; [[חוֹף יַמִּים]] Ge 49:13, Ju Jdg 5:17; cf. [[חֶבֶל הַיׇּם]] Zep 2:5 region by the sea; so v:Zep 2:6 but dub., v. I. [[חֶבֶל]]

definitions.title: 3. b.
definitions.body: sand of the sea (shore) [[חוֹל הַיׇּם]] (in sim.) Ge 32:13, Ge 41:49, Ho 2:1, Is 10:22 + oft. (v. [[חוֹל]]); [[חוֹל גְּבוּל לַיׇּם]] Je 5:22.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: [[לְשׁוֹן]] [[הַיׇּם]] tongue (arm or gulf) of sea Jos 15:5, Jos 18:19, Is 11:5.

= (west, west-word (orig. sea-ward, fr. position of Mediterr. with ref. to Palestine, and this sense still often perceptible): with other three points of compass Ge 13:14, Ge 28:14 (J), Nu 2:18, Nu 35:5 (P), De 3:27, 1Ki 7:25, 1Ch 9:24, 2Ch 4:4, Ez Eze 42:19 + 6 t. Ez, Zec 14:4, Da 8:4, Ps 107:3 ([[מִמִּזְרָח וּמִמַּעֲרָב מִצָּפוֹן וּמִיׇּם]]; but rd. perh. [[וּמִיׇּמִן]] from the south, Hu Pe Bi Che); opp. east Jos 11:2, Jos 16:6 + 16 t. Ez Eze 48; west alone Ge 12:8 (J); [[רוּהַ יׇם]] Ez Eze 10:19 (J) west wind; [[מִיׇּם לְ]] westward Jos 8:9, Jos 8:12, Jos 8:13 +; [[יׇ֫מָּה]] westward, oft. of tabernacle Ex 26:22, Ex 26:27, Nu 3:23 + (all P), and of land Jos 5:1, Jos 15:8, Jos 15:10 etc., + oft. Ez; [[דֶּרֶח הַיׇּם]] = westward Ez Eze 41:12; [[גְּבוּל יׇם]] western border Nu 34:6, Nu 34:6, Jos 15:2; [[פְּאַת־יׇם]] west side Ex 27:12, Ex 38:12, Nu 35:5, Jos 18:14; [[פְּאַת דרך]] [[הים]] Ez Eze 41:12 (v. further [[פאה]]).
